Package com.badlogic.gdx.input.recorder

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InputRecordReader
    Interface for classes that provide access to a stream of data describing changes to an instance of Input.
    InputRecordWriter
    Interface for classes providing means to save or transmit user input recorded by am InputRecorder.
    InputValue.AsyncValueVisitor
    An interface to enable the visitor pattern on InputValue.AsyncValues.
    InputValue.SyncValueVisitor
    An interface to enable the visitor pattern on InputValue.SyncValues.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InputRecorder
    The main class for input recording in a libGDX application.
    InputRecorderConfiguration
    A class to configure new instances of InputRecorder
    InputRecordPlayer
    Standard implementation of a player playing back recorded or generated input.
    InputState
    A snapshot of all real-time values to be read from an input at a certain time.
    InputValue
    Parent class of all (groups of) properties that make up an InputState .
    InputValue.AsyncValue  
    InputValue.AsyncValue.PlaceholderText  
    InputValue.AsyncValue.Text  
    InputValue.StaticValues  
    InputValue.SyncValue  
    InputValue.SyncValue.Accelerometer  
    InputValue.SyncValue.Button  
    InputValue.SyncValue.KeyEvent  
    InputValue.SyncValue.KeyPressed  
    InputValue.SyncValue.Orientation  
    InputValue.SyncValue.Pointer  
    InputValue.SyncValue.PointerEvent  
    JsonInputRecordReader
    Simple implementation of a InputRecordReader reading input data from a json formatted file, most likely generated using JsonInputRecordWriter.
    JsonInputRecordWriter
    Simple implementation of an InputRecordWriter that writes given user input data to a set of three files (one each for static, sync and async values) using the json format.
    RandomInputRecordReader
    Reader to generate random input to be fed to the application.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    InputValue.SyncValue.Type
